Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Cicero
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Pulaski, Archer, Cicero and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Pulaski, Archer, Cicero and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cicero
ShortDescription: NB 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Archer, Pulaski and I-55 Cicero exit due to, street blockage near 47th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Archer, Pulaski and I-55 Cicero exit due to, street blockage near 47th/Cicero.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
